data.title: Prince Narula And Yuvika Chaudhary Host Intimate Baby Shower For Their Family And Friends; Serve Major Couple Goals
meta_keywords: Prince Narula Yuvika Chaudhary baby shower
data.meta_description: Prince Narula and Yuvika Chaudhary will soon embrace parenthood after six years of marriage. The couple recently hosted a baby shower for their friends and family.
data.text:
Prince Narula and Yuvika Chaudhary are one of the most loved couples in the television industry and have been married for over six years. The couple will soon welcome their first child and recently hosted a baby shower for their close friends and family. They looked absolutely amazing together at the event and were surrounded by their loved ones.

Prince looked dapper as he wore a blue shirt paired with white trousers. Yuvika looked absolutely stunning in a white dress and radiated a beautiful glow.

Prince earlier appeared on Bharti Singh and Haarsh Limbachiyaa's podcast and talked about planning a family. In the podcast, Bharti jokingly asked Prince, "When is Golla coming?", indicating when the couple is planning to have a baby. To this, Prince replied, "Very soon." Prince also revealed that he and Yuvika wanted to plan a baby after buying their own house in Mumbai.

On the work front, Prince Narula is best known for his reality television shows. He participated in MTV's shows 'Roadies X2' and 'Splitsvilla 8' and emerged as the winner in both of them. Prince further participated in the reality show 'Bigg Boss 9' and went on to win this show as well. He met Yuvika in 'Bigg Boss 9' and the two started dating after the show ended.

Also Read | DYK Prince Narula And Yuvika Chaudhary Announced Pregnancy Following Doctor's Approval?

Also Read |Prince Narula And Yuvika Chaudhary Are Pregnant With First Child; Couple Shares Long Emotional Note Saying ‘Privika Baby Aane Wala Hai’

He tried his hand at acting after he was seen in 'Badho Bahu' as the main protagonist. Yuvika and Prince then further collaborated for 'Nach Baliye 9' and won the show. They were seen together in an episode of the horror television show 'Laal Ishq'. The two featured in the music videos of the songs 'Hello Hello' and 'Tiki Tiki Raat'.

Yuvika Chaudhary gained recognition after starring in Shah Rukh Khan and Deepika Padukone-led movie 'Om Shanti Om'. She was last seen in the show 'Cyber Vaar' along with Mohit Malik and Sanaya Irani.
